questions.prompt: List the item(s)—and only the item(s)—missing from this list of standard ingredients that constitute a McDonald's Big Mac: cheese, lettuce, sesame seed bun, special sauce, two all-beef patties.
Through its roughly 3,000-mile course, the Mekong River runs along two national capitals. Name either of these two cities.
The Mexican–American War of 1846 was precipitated, in part, by the United States' annexation of what independent republic the year prior?

What is the term used in interior design for a type of decorative interior wall paneling that covers the lower portion of a wall and was first used to protect the bottom half of a plaster wall and to help to insulate a room? (Gerund and nongerund forms of the word are acceptable.)
A process of reasoning and problem-solving based on ambiguous and imprecise data is known as what type of "logic", a term introduced by computer scientist and electrical engineer Lotfi Zadeh in 1965?

Dance musicals based on the music of Billy Joel (Movin' Out), Bob Dylan (The Times They Are a-Changin'), and Frank Sinatra (Come Fly Away) are among the many works of what exalted choreographer of ballet and modern dance?
